attributes.action: Legalise and allow pyrotechnic companies to manufacture firecrackers ( bangers )
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to bring back the enjoyment of firecrackers with responsible use. This would bring profit to firework companies. In countries such as France or Italy firecrackers are a huge success and the demand for them in the UK is high.
